name: Little Shop Simulator
description:
Who to play?

W, A, S, D for movement.
Mouse click for interaction.

The interactions require the player character to be near the item or NPC.
You have two inventories. One is your “shopping cart”, and the other your personal inventory.
To move the items from the cart, you need to talk to the shopkeeper.
After buying the items, you can equip them. Click on their icon at your personal inventory (bottom).
